pages.text: Sometimes it's not economical to mine for ore or pick up nuggets, often on servers. This is where $(thing)sluicing and panning$() come in.

pages.title: Goldpan
pages.text: The $(thing)gold pan$() is a basic and effective way of getting ore nuggets. It's crafted with just a simple $(l:basic_smithing/casting)ceramic bowl$(). $(4)Right-click$() on the ground and then hold down $(4)right-click$() on a water source. You'll either get nothing, or some platinum, silver, copper, or gold.
The sluice is used to filter out sand and gravel for gems and ores.
pages.title: Sluice

pages.text: $(thing)Use of the Sluice$()$(br2)1. Find shoreline and dig out a trench a few blocks to create flowing water.$(br)2. Dig your flowing water trench 1 block down and 2 blocks long$(br)3. Place the sluice so that the water flows down into the sluice.$(br)4. Drop $(item)sand or gravel$() into the sluice and wait.$(br2)The sluice gives you ores that are in the rock underneath you, and gems.
